entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.2.0
entry.content:
Changelog:

  • added integration for calibre web automated book downloader
  • you can now send ebooks to your kindle via email
  • you can now mark books as read / unread
  • you can now toggle the archived status of a book
  • you can add and remove books from shelfs
  • changed namespace
